name: Skiing Season Plus
description:
Skiing Season Plus!!!
In Game,you are skiing when a avalanche is coming,escape to survive!Rush down on the snowy mountains that full of dangers and obstacles.Show your skiing skill and escape capability to reach the safety zone!
HOW TO PLAY:
Control the guy moving around to avoid the obstacles that you encounter during skiing.
Using vibration mode to move left and right.
Take advantage of all your finesse to achieve the highest achievement.
